headline: Legal AI Training Suits And Analyst Doubts Could Be A Game Changer For Adobe (ADBE)
summary: In February 2026, Adobe faced renewed scrutiny as fresh lawsuits alleged the willful use of pirated books to train its AI models, just weeks after it announced an AI-focused enterprise content collaboration with Cognizant. At the same time, a wave of analyst downgrades questioned whether Adobe’s AI roadmap can protect its creative software franchise against emerging AI-native competitors. We’ll now examine how this growing analyst skepticism about Adobe’s AI strategy and legal risks may...

headline: Palantir’s Miami Move Reframes Growth, Partnerships And Valuation Debate
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) is relocating its headquarters from Denver to Miami, aligning with a broader move by tech firms into South Florida. The shift comes alongside expanded commercial contracts and partnerships in aerospace and cloud services. Recent developments include extended Department of Defense cloud authorizations across on premises and edge deployments. New alliances with companies such as Cognizant and Rackspace are aimed at wider AI adoption across...
